心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... intervening mechanism 中介机制 intervening variable 中介变量 intervention 干预.
中介变项(Intervening Variable): 介于自变项与依变项之间的一切对实验结果发生作用的内在历程,而且不能由直接观察办认. 例如 X->Z->Y
干扰变量(Intervening Variables)：属于研究中可以判断其存在，但是无法控制或测量的变量，也有的叫中间变量、无关变量，或复合 …

entry.tran: (时间段)介于中间的,发生于其间的
entry.def: An intervening period of time is one that separates two events or points in time.

example.ex: During those intervening years Bridget had married her husband Robert...
example.tran: 在那中间的几年里,布里奇特嫁给了她的丈夫罗伯特。

example.ex: I had spent the intervening time in London, with Gretchen.
example.tran: 我与格蕾琴在伦敦度过了那中间的一段时间。

entry.def: An intervening object or area comes between two other objects or areas.

example.ex: They had scoured the intervening miles of moorland.
example.tran: 他们已经仔细搜遍了其间绵延数英里的高沼地。

means.word_mean: 1. occurring or falling between events or points in time;

sentences.sentence: "so much had happened during the intervening years"

means.word_mean: 2. standing between or separating two objects or areas;

sentences.sentence: "Paris--where the same city lies on both sides of an intervening river"
"after reaching the top of the hill he looked across an intervening meadow to another line of hills"
